description: This file sets up an agent for image generation using the Gemini model, runs a prompt to generate an image, and displays the resulting images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the Gemini model for image generation.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt to generate content.

methods.name: get_images
methods.description: Retrieves generated images from the agent.
